pageContext.claim: “Look at, look at basketball. The finals were down 71%. You know why? Because people want respect for our nation. For our flag.”
pageContext.analysis: Experts have suggested a number of possible reasons are behind the significant decline in viewership of the NBA Finals. One reason could be the timing of the end of season — including competition against other sports (in this case against an NFL game). Others have noted President Trump also diagnosed with covid-19 at the same time as the final game. In other words, it is not clear how much, if at all, the social justice protests contributed to the declining viewership.
